alert.note: Alert for Cass (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 2:14AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CASS COUNTY THROUGH 245 AM CDT... At 213 AM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Griswold, or 13 miles south of Atlantic, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Atlantic, Griswold, Lewis, Cumberland, Marne, Wiota, Cold Springs State Park, Griswold Park, Atlantic Municipal Airport, and Lake Anita State Park. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 50 and 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
